title: The Experiment Known as Rose Marie Hernandez Willamson
description: My whole life Iâ€™ve been stranded on a spaceship with my parents and the crew of the spaceship Grimm Explorer.Who am I?I am Rose Marie Hernandez Williamson and I was born in outer space. I used to think the hardest part about growing up out here would be naming the planets.Now, I think it will be getting back to Earth alive.
author: Louise Robertson
